players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us all work together to ensure this doesn't happen again."
You: "I'm deeply saddened by the turn of events last night. Let us all try to remain calm and focused during this investigation so we can bring the true culprit to justice."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us all work together to ensure this doesn't happen again."
Bob: "I'm deeply saddened by the turn of events last night. Let us all try to remain calm and focused during this investigation so we can bring the true culprit to justice."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
